structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Designation of Grange City Covered Bridge.
law.text: The Hillsboro Covered Bridge in Fleming County is renamed and designated the "Grange City Covered Bridge."
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 404, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998.
